column5: My place is close to The Dallas Arboretum and Botanical Gardens, and White Rock Lake. It only takes 14 minutes to get to Downtown Dallas/Fair Park. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the coziness, access to fully loaded kitchen, comfy queen size bed, and quick highway access. Dallas is a city that you need a car. There is plenty of free parking in front of my house. I have another room in this house that I have been Airbnbing since May 2016
